name: Plush World
description:
Prequel to tChamber, but this time it's a First Person Platformer, still has some of the key elements of tChamber such as grabbing props or the radio (with a diferent model).

CONTROLS

AWSD - Movement
Shift - Sprint
Space - Jump
Ctrl - Crouch
U - Restart
C - Zoom In
Z - Zoom Out
E - Interact
Left Click  (Hold) - Grab
Left Click (Release) - Drop
Right Click - Yeet (when grabbing)

------

ALPHA 1.0 CHANGE LOG

-Released game.
